dmca.title: Weight Watchers' Trademark and Copyright Watch
dmca.body:
Dear [Recipient], 

It has come to our attention that you have developed and sell software downloads on the www.palmgear.com website that utilize our trademarks and copyright. 

Your "Weight Watchers Food Companion 2.0" makes use of our WEIGHT WATCHERS
dmca.sender_name: Law Department Weight Watchers International, Inc.
